title: Silk Saree
description: handmade silk saree designed by my wife.

title: Madhuban Artowrk
description: This captivating Madhubani vase, handcrafted from natural clay, showcases a striking zig-zag pattern in deep indigo. Each chevron is meticulously painted, echoing traditional artistry. Imagine this piece adorning your home, carrying stories of skilled hands and ancient traditions into the modern day. A true testament to heritage craftsmanship.
feedback: wonderful item with good quality worth the price.

title: Madhana Painting
material: natural colors, wood frame, canvas made up of leaf
description: This Madhana painting, crafted on leaf canvas with natural colors and a wooden frame, captures a woman engrossed in decorating earthen pots. The intricate white motifs adorning her attire and the vibrant geometric patterns on the vessels speak volumes of traditional artistry. It evokes a serene narrative of rural life and artistic dedication.

title: Pearl Jewelry
description: Experience timeless elegance with this handcrafted brass, gold-plated jewelry set. Intricate detailing showcases vibrant ruby and emerald hues, accented by auspicious coin motifs. Each piece whispers tales of heritage, meticulously crafted by skilled artisans. Adorn yourself with this statement set, a perfect blend of tradition and luxury for any celebration.

title: Indian Wood Carving
description: Crafted from fragrant sandalwood, this exquisite Indian wood carving tells a story of divine blessings. Intricate detailing brings to life Ganesha, Lakshmi, and Saraswati, flanked by majestic elephants. Each stroke of the artisan's hand imbues this masterpiece with spiritual resonance and timeless beauty, a cherished heirloom for any discerning collector.
